post_title: FS: T206 Ungraded HOF and Rare Backs [3.1.2025] - NO LONGER FOR SALE
post_content:
Available for sale are the following cards:

T-206 - Napolean Lajoie [Polar Bear] - SOLD [BIG PRICE DROP]
T-206 - John McGraw Cap [Sovereign] - SOLD [ADDED 3.4.25]
T-206 - John McGraw No Cap [Piedmont] - [ADDED 3.4.25]
T-206 - Joe Tinker [Piedmont] - SOLD
T-206 - Red Ames [Sovereign 150] - SOLD

T-206 - Red Ames [Old Mill] - 
T-206 - Chief Bender Portrait [Sweet Caporal 350/30] - PRICE DROP]
T-206 - Chief Bender Pitching [Sweet Caporal 350/30] - [PRICE DROP]
T-206 - Jimmy Collins [Sweet Caporal 350/30] - SOLD
T-206 - Jake Beckley [Polar Bear] -  [PRICE DROP]
T-206 - Lou Fiene [Piedmont] - [ADDED 3.4.25]
T-206 - Larry Doyle With Bat [Piedmont] - ADDED 3.4.25]



If you want to purchase any card:

1. The first person to post "I'll take it" will get the card. This post will secure the card in front of anyone else who may be in communication with me regarding that card.
2. Email me at [url]jmanners51@gmail.com[/url] by putting the name of the card in the subject line and your address in the text.
3. Remit payment by PayPal (PPFF - the price above is NET TO ME).
4. I don't have easy access to a Post Office so please allow up to 5 days for me to get to the Post Office to mail the card.

I’ll take the Tinker
PM on the Joe Tinker sent.
Also email.
